Amade OFFICE The Seal of Sub-Registrar Office OF JOINT SUBREGI TRAR2/100-10315 Nature of Land: The Government has obtained the title deed from them and has obtained receipt No. 201194898362437 confirming that there are no dues from the Housing Development Corporation on the house site which is in the possession of the claimant for more than 10 years. The Government has decided to register this document with the intention of giving them full and permanent rights to the fruits of the houses enjoyed by the applicants or heirs under the Jagannana Sampurna Gruha Haqq Scheme.
Subject to AP Assigned Lands (POT) (AMENDMENT), section 3 (24) and Section 3 (2B); and in accordance with GO MS No 314, Revenue (Lands-I) Department, dated: 11/11/2021, this document is hereby issued.
Therefore, from now on, you can freely enjoy the said Scheduled Office with the powers of donation, exchange, sale and transfer up to your son and grandson's descendants as per your wish. If you do so, neither the Government of Andhra Pradesh nor their representatives will have any claim or dispute against you, your heirs or your representatives in the future. You will have to pay all taxes payable on the said immovable property in your name. Signature of the person who has written

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: VENKATAPURAM/VENKATAPURAM W-B: 10-0 SURVEY: 130 HOUSE:10-3/149 EXTENT: 50SQ.Yds BUILT: 450SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: CC ROAD [S] CC ROAD [E]: CC ROAD [W]: ROUTHU RAVANAMMA HOUSE

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 312005 of 2022, dated 23/Jun/2022, executed by Government of Andhra Pradesh Represented by Bankapalli Sathyam Regidiamadalavalasa Tahsildar in favour of Nelli Jyothi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 50.0000 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 3-149, comprised in survey number 130, situated in Venkatapuram Village, Ambada Grama Panchayath, Regidiamadalavalasa Mandal, within the District of Srikakulam registered at sub-registrar office Palakonda is bounded as follows: North by: CC Road South by: CC Road East by: CC Road West by: House of Routhu Ravanamma
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is observed from the recitals of the deed that the SRO Name is mentioned as Ambada, whereas, the document is registered before the SRO Palakonda, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to verify the same. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
